name: CustomFakerTest
description: Test suite for custom faker implementations, focusing on insect-related data generation and file path handling.

nested_classes.name: MyCustomFaker
nested_classes.description: Custom faker class extending BaseFaker, providing insect-related data generation methods.

nested_classes.name: Insect
nested_classes.description: Provider class for generating insect names from a predefined list.

nested_classes.name: InsectFromFile
nested_classes.description: Provider class for generating insect names from files, specifically ants and bees.

test_cases.name: addNullExistingPath
test_cases.description: Tests that adding a null path to BaseFaker throws an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: addNonExistingPath
test_cases.description: Tests that adding a non-existing path to BaseFaker throws an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: insectTest
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of insect names from a predefined list.

test_cases.name: insectTestExpression
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of insect names using a custom expression.

test_cases.name: insectAntTestExpressionFromFile
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of ant names from a file.

test_cases.name: insectBeeTestExpressionFromFile
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of bee names from a file, ensuring they end with 'bee'.

test_cases.name: insectBeeTestExpressionFromFileWithoutExtraFaker
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of bee names from a file using BaseFaker directly.

test_cases.name: insectTestWithoutExtraFaker
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of insect names using BaseFaker directly.

test_cases.name: testMultipleFakerContextsPerOneClassName
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of multiple faker contexts with different locales and ensures they are distinct.
